div.p: This code system https://terminology.smarthealth.cards/CodeSystem/designation-use defines the following codes:

tr.td: Indicates the display name for a term that should be shown to consumers (e.g., to identify a vaccine in a SHC wallet app's user interface).

title.value: SMART Health Card Terminology Designation Use

description.value: Identifies the designation would be used SMART Health Card terminology

definition.value: Indicates the display name for a term that should be shown to consumers (e.g., to identify a vaccine in a SHC wallet app's user interface).
